response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects the investment we've made into its development and the high demand for such products. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this opportunity.", "product_price": 12000}
